attributes.action: Sustain the greater Police presence in post riot England
attributes.additional_details:
Since the fierce riots of August 2011 have ceased, one will notice an increased Police presence, not just in major city centres, but in local areas too.

I would like to see this sustained on a permanent basis as I feel it definitely improves public confidence at the street level.

Whatever red tape has had to be put on hold I would not want it to interfere with their current strategy.  It is definitely working and quite refreshing for the law-abiding citizen to experience.

Please make the greater Police presence a permanent fixture in both city centres and local areas.
